com.github.essobedo.appma.core.progress

Class LogProgress

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.essobedo.appma.task.TaskProgress
      • com.github.essobedo.appma.core.progress.LogProgress
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskObserver, Observer

    public final class LogProgress
extends TaskProgress
    Class allowing to log any progress of a given task. It is used by default for all non Java FX tasks.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Nicolas Filotto (nicolas.filotto@gmail.com)

      Constructs a LogProgress with the specified task.
